name: Emerge (Sandmonger Games)
description:
While exploring some seemingly abandoned caves on this desert world you became trapped. Thankfully there is more to these caves than it first seemed. They are filled with the ruins of... well something.

To escape your fate you will need to bring these ancient ruins back to life, possibly discovering who built them and why.

Emerge is a short puzzle adventure game for 1-2 players. The version presented here is a pre-production demo to facilitate testing the puzzle design, and to get feedback on which puzzles players find interesting.

The levels presented here are not decorated. Final graphics will come once the puzzles have been playtested and finalized.

The final version will include story and adventure elements not seen in this demo, as well as the option to play with a friend.
